description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任河北省政协副主席，中共七大代表。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as the vice chairman of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and was a delegate to the 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议河北省委员会
en: Hebei Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在河北省的地方委员会。
description.en: The local committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Hebei Province.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会
en: 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1945年在延安召开的一次全国代表大会。
description.en: A national congress held by the Communist Party of China in Yan'an in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 姜占春出生于直隶平山县（今河北省平山县）。
description.en: Jiang Zhanchun was born in Pingshan County, Zhili (modern-day Pingshan County, Hebei).

description.zh-cn: 姜占春曾担任河北省政协副主席。
description.en: Jiang Zhanchun served as the Vice Chairman of the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 姜占春是中共七大的代表。
description.en: Jiang Zhanchun was a delegate to the 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据“中国共产党党员”分类，姜占春是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Based on the category 'Communist Party of China members', Jiang Zhanchun was a member of the Communist Party of China.
